name: Float (itch) (gameslee)
description:
Float is a physics based arcade game, where the player controls a green ball and tries to go the furthest distance that they can. Pressing and holding the arrow keys adds force in that direction, while pressing space shoots out a small portion of yourself which can be used to destroy walls and enemies. 

Frustratingly Addicting

Easy to pick up, but hard to master. Float's unique control system requires the player to carefully add forces in the wanted direction - too much and the player can lose control of their character!

Infinite Side Scrolling

Procedurally generated content means an infinite map, as long as you survive!

Learnable

The map layout is the same each time you play, so the player can learn the optimal route, or use muscle memory to achieve high scores!
